segments.text: Yes , I have a driving license .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you willing to drive yourself if the job requires ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One more thing , if you are wanted in this position , you must prepare to travel aboard frequently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As long as it isn't too far from this city , I don't mind .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It â€™ s quite far away , though it's located in another part of the city . Are you planning to find a boarding house nearby ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I can commute that far without any trouble .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . Do you have any particular conditions that you want us to take into consideration ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , nothing in particular . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then you'll need to know it's a hard job . You'll often have to work overtime or even on weekends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I don't mind working hard .
segments.speaker: S2
